timeline.message:
Implement Shard Snapshot Clone Logic

First part of the snapshot clone logic that implements the snapshot clone functionality on
the repository level.

timeline.bodyText: This class is obviously not necessary here (aside from introducing the type for the API), it'll play a more central role in the state machine.
